A comic writer's response

Jul 31, 2006

Ricardo, a student in my program, sent around a link to his friend Mazen Kerbaj’s blog on which he posts drawings documenting his experience of the war in Lebanon. They’re sometimes funny and sometimes sad, but always an amazing look into one person’s experience of this tragedy. He also posts the images and words on Flickr.

MY LIFE TODAY phone (a lot) music table tennis moujaddara and cabbage salad at my parents drawing (not much) cigarettes and beers television LIKE EVERY DAY

technorati tags:war, israel, lebanon, art
